mapper.select: select v.orifilename as file_name, v.assetfilename as registed_name from vttm_video_tb v where v.idx = #{idx}

select s.sectionname as visual_period_num, s.sectionid as period_num, s.starttimecode as start_time, s.endtimecode as end_time from vttm_section_info_tb s where s.videoid = #{idx} order by s.startshotid, s.endshotid

select r.object_sectionid related_period, c.code_name as related_type from vttm_section_relation_tb r inner join vttm_code_tb c on r.relationcode = c.code where r.videoid = #{idx} and r.userid = #{userid} and r.subject_sectionid = #{sectionid} order by r.subject_sectionid, r.object_sectionid
